name: test-driven-development
description: Ensures code quality by requiring a failing test before writing implementation code. Follows the Red-Green-Refactor cycle.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: tdd
commands.description: Apply the Test-Driven Development cycle to a feature or bugfix.
commands.prompt: You are an expert at Test-Driven Development. Guide the implementation of the following feature or bugfix using the Red-Green-Refactor cycle: {{description}}
